import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
from lightgbm import LGBMRegressor
from catboost import CatBoostRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error, r2_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Separate features and target
X_train = train.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_train = train['SalePrice']
X_val = validation.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_val = validation['SalePrice']
X_test = test.drop(['Id'], axis=1)

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Feature engineering: create age and years since remod
X_train['Age'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearBuilt']
X_train['RemodAge'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearRemodAdd']
X_val['Age'] = X_val['YrSold'] - X_val['YearBuilt']
X_val['RemodAge'] = X_val['YrSold'] - X_val['YearRemodAdd']
X_test['Age'] = X_test['YrSold'] - X_test['YearBuilt']
X_test['RemodAge'] = X_test['YrSold'] - X_test['YearRemodAdd']

# Drop irrelevant columns
X_train = X_train.drop(['YearBuilt', 'YearRemodAdd', 'YrSold'], axis=1)
X_val = X_val.drop(['YearBuilt', 'YearRemodAdd', 'YrSold'], axis=1)
X_test = X_test.drop(['YearBuilt', 'YearRemodAdd', 'YrSold'], axis=1)

# Fill missing values
for col in categorical_columns:
    X_train[col] = X_train[col].fillna(X_train[col].mode()[0])
    X_val[col] = X_val[col].fillna(X_val[col].mode()[0])
    X_test[col] = X_test[col].fillna(X_test[col].mode()[0
